mapper.select: SELECT A.GAME_NO , A.B_MEMBER_NO , A.W_MEMBER_NO FROM HFC.HFC_OMOK_GAME A WHERE A.B_MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND A.VICTORY IS NULL

SELECT A.CELL_NO , A.CELL_ROW , A.CELL_NM , A.QNA_NO , B.B_MEMBER_NO , B.W_MEMBER_NO , B.STONE FROM HFC.HFC_OMOK_CELL A LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_OMOK_HISTORY B ON (A.CELL_NO = B.CELL_NO AND B.GAME_NO = #{game_no} AND B.CORRECT_YN=1) ORDER BY A.CELL_ROW, CELL_COL

SELECT A.CELL_NO , A.CELL_NM , B.QNA_NO , B.QUESTION , B.ANSWER , B.ATTACH_TYPE , B.ATTACH_FILE FROM HFC.HFC_OMOK_CELL A LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_QNA B ON (A.QNA_NO = B.QNA_NO AND B.DEL_YN = 0) WHERE A.CELL_NO = #{cell_no}
